solution_line_template: In this many years, Emma’s sister will be {sister_target_age} years old: {sister_target_age} - {sister_age} = <<{sister_target_age}-{sister_age}={years_until_sister_56}>>{years_until_sister_56} years.
When her sister is {sister_target_age} years old, Emma will be {emma_age} + {years_until_sister_56} = <<{emma_age}+{years_until_sister_56}={emma_age_when_sister_56}>>{emma_age_when_sister_56} years.
